name: Unbound
intro: The one-stop solution to lend and borrow gaming NFTs
introduce: Unbound is the one-stop solution that connects gaming Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) with gamers by building a one-stop solution to lend and borrow web3 gaming assets. The platform serves and connects all stakeholders in the blockchain gaming space alike, no matter if gaming studios aiming for user growth, gamers looking for access to assets, or NFT holders that want to earn passive income through lending.
